projects.name: Addy Compiler
projects.description: A compiler program written for a fictional programming language based in C#.

projects.name: Broken Cube
projects.description: A program being worked on in Java that is the extent of an entirety of a Minecraft mini-game server.

projects.name: ProjectzHUB
projects.description: A google-drive like website that is used to organize projects among others.

projects.name: Reddit Grabber
projects.description: A program that is used to grab and filter through subreddits in a personally desired manner.

projects.name: Sync
projects.description: A program that syncs my Google Drive projects with my web-server folder.

projects.name: Search Algorithm
projects.description: A program written in Scala that indexes files and then uses basic text-based input to retrieve files fitting the query and rank them based off of importance.

projects.name: Personal Site
projects.description: The project that is my personal website (the website you're on now)!

projects.name: Strings and Pins
projects.description: A 6-month long project completed for my capstone in unison with Professor Munehiro Fukuda at the University of Washington, Bothell. Worked in the universities own distributed computing library, MASS. Wrote a program that translated the common shortest path problem into a two-dimensional spacial problem and used an agent-based model in order to derive another solution to the problem.

projects.name: Disassembler
projects.description: A 3-month project working in the 68k assembler to write a program that takes in the binary of a compiled program and de-compiles it into its original 68k language.

projects.name: Steam Parties
projects.description: A 3-month project working with 2 others to create a program running in AWS to help find and create steam parties off of people that have similar games to the user.

projects.name: Backup and Retrieve Files
projects.description: A simple program written in Java to help backup and store files to AWS.

projects.name: ThreadOS File System
projects.description: A program written in Java that creates and runs as an operating system's file system.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A 3-month project working with two others to build a server program and a client program to host, list, join, and play games of Tic-Tac-Toe with others using the program.

projects.name: Sliding Window Algorithm
projects.description: A simple algorithm written in C++ that replicates the sliding window algorithm used for networking and communications.

projects.name: Memory Allocation Algorithm
projects.description: A program written in C++ that allocates memory for a program.

projects.name: Webpage Retriever
projects.description: A program written in C++ that makes a request to a web server and retrieves a data-page.

projects.name: Thread Scheduler MFQ
projects.description: A program written in Java that enacts as a thread scheduler using the MFQ algorithm.

projects.name: Synchronized Thread Queue
projects.description: A program written in C++ that enacts as a synchronized thread scheduler.

projects.name: Thread Scheduler
projects.description: A short program written in C++ that enacts as a primitive thread scheduler.

projects.name: Interpreter
projects.description: A quick program written in C to create an interpreter for a programming language.

projects.name: Parser
projects.description: A quick program written in C to create a parser for a programming language.

projects.name: Auto Del Bin/Obj
projects.description: A program that runs daily within my Google Drive to go through and delete the bin and obj folders from C# programs to significantly reduce the size of the files.

projects.name: Recognizer
projects.description: A quick program written in C to create a recognizer for a programming language.

projects.name: Lexer
projects.description: A quick program written in C to create a lexer for a programming language.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: An introductory program into C building a text-based commandline calculator.

projects.name: Language Data Types
projects.description: A 3-month project taking in different programming languages and mapping out their equivalent data types and functions across other programming languages in an attempt to help people who already know a language, learn another.

projects.name: Puzzle Solver
projects.description: A program written in C++ that takes in sudoku puzzles and works to solve them.

projects.name: Reneblade
projects.description: A 6-month project working with 4 others to build a pixelart arena-style combat game within the Unity engine to earn 2nd place in the Hunt the Wumpus alumni challenge at Microsoft campus.

projects.name: Stat Tracker
projects.description: A two-part program written in C# and the common web platform that allows statical tracking in Unity programs to be pushed and analyzed in a web-based client.

projects.name: Image Editor
projects.description: A small program written in C# that allows you to import an image and perform simple quick edits to it such as edge detection, color transposition, sharpening, and more.

projects.name: File Scraper
projects.description: A basic program that takes in a textual input of one or more directories and traverses them and outputs to the file structure to the console.

projects.name: Hunt the Wumpus
projects.description: A 6-month project working with 4 others to compete in the Microsoft competition of creating the game 'Hunt the Wumpus' within the Unity engine.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: A program that runs a graphical interface and is a mock of the default windows calculator app.

projects.name: Mine Sweeper
projects.description: A graphical program that runs the classic game of Minesweeper.

projects.name: Web Crawler
projects.description: A simple program written in PHP that, when given a website URL, traverses the page and retrieves the links of the page. These links are then traversed as well, and is done so until no new links are provided.
